underlying_goal: Test and verify a PPV detection/check system (PPV ID 48200087) using Playwright browser automation, fix discovered bugs, and investigate production verification status
brief_summary: User requested testing of PPV ID 48200087 in their detection and check systems; Claude successfully ran browser-based tests, identified and fixed four bugs (type inconsistency, race conditions, state leakage, XSS), and performed diagnostic investigation of the production verification check page revealing a 42% success rate with display issues.
